Title: Qur’an Memorization for Kids
Subtitle: Step-by-Step Qur’an Memorization with Correct Tajwīd for Children

FAQ.Question: Is it only memorization?
FAQ.Answer: No. The course builds pronunciation, Tajwīd, fluency, discipline, and emotional connection.

FAQ.Question: Can my child start with zero Arabic?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Designed for non-Arab & English-speaking kids.

FAQ.Question: Is Tajwīd difficult while memorizing?
FAQ.Answer: No. Tajwīd is applied naturally through repetition and practice.

FAQ.Question: Will my child be able to memorize independently?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Fluency and memory exercises prepare them for independent memorization.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With patience, guidance, and structured revision — never pressure.

Sections.Heading: About Course
Sections.Content: A structured program that helps children memorize the Qur’an step by step while ensuring correct pronunciation and Tajwīd. Focuses on memory techniques, fluency, confidence, and love for Allah’s Book.

Sections.Heading: Who Is It For?
Content: Children who can read but need to memorize
Children who memorize incorrectly without Tajwīd
Children who need structure or lose focus easily

Content:
Tajwīd for Kids (Practical & Simple)

Sections.Heading: What Will Your Child Achieve?
Content: Love and respect for the Qur’an
